alert.note: Alert for Cass; Clay; Jackson; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 20 at 7:01AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Kansas and west central Missouri, including the following counties, in Kansas, Johnson KS and Wyandotte. In west central Missouri, Cass, Clay, Jackson and Platte. * WHEN...Until 900 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 659 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between a quarter inch and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kansas City, Overland Park, Olathe, Independence, Lee`s Summit, Shawnee, Lenexa, Leawood, Raytown, Liberty, Gladstone, Grandview, Belton, Prairie Village, Gardner, Merriam, Mission, Bonner Springs, De Soto and Parkville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
